column4: 3rd time ... Help Please ? Update Manager problem on Gutsy, pasted at  http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/61956/
can you post the packages to pastebin? or, better yet, in a terminal, run `sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade` and paste the output of that?
Will try that ... will have to be in a few more minutes ... thanks !
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/61963/   Results of (1) sudo apt-get update
that looks fine- what's the eric.lavar repository for?
your pastebin output looks fine- what's the eric.lavar repository for?

that    http://eric.lavar.de   seems to be for some "Third Party Software"  result of  sudo apt-get upgrade ---> http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/61965/   and I see some errors, but no idea how to fix them.
line 2 of /var/lib/dpkg/available says       Status: install ok installed
did you see that forums link? the solution there was to copy available-old to available (both in /var/lib/dpkg)
I missed that link ... and see that "available" lines 1 & 2 say: Package: python-bittorrent
or sudo -s , then cd /var/lib/dpkg/, then mv them around :)
That worked !!  14 updates .. and all seems good ... Thank YOU !!!
